snippet.title: Where Is The Least Ballin' Place You Could Possibly Be Arrested?
snippet.description:
Where Is The Least Ballin' Place You Could Possibly Be Arrested? by Jon Bois on Oct 4 2011, 1:25p
Tuesday, we learned that Houston Astros outfielder Jordan Schafer was arrested on felony charges at a Cheesecake Factory. Now, it sucks to be arrested to begin with, but to be arrested at a...
